content: superstar filet square materials yarn any yarn will work i used medium/dk weight for my example square crochet hook any hook will work i used a i hook for my example square 5 5 mm scissors stitch markers notes i fasten_off each row to change colors video tutorial here and step by step photo tutorial here to keep your square straight flip your work every other row crochet stitches needed chain chain stitch st skip skip playlist featuring how to start a circle techniques here slip_stitch slip_stitch video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here double_crochet stitch double_crochet video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here superstar filet square pattern pick your favorite way to start a circle or square playlist above row 1 make circle chain 3 2 double_crochet into center of circle chain 3 *3 double_crochet into circle chain 3 repeat from * 2 more times slip_stitch into first double_crochet stitch made in this row row 2 chain 4 chain 1 skip st connected to that chain 4 just made * 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet into next corner space 1 double_crochet into next st chain 1 skip 1 st 1 double_crochet into next st repeat from * around sl st into the 1st chs you made in this row row 3 chain 4 *skip previous chain 1 space 1 double_crochet into each st across to next corner space 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet into that corner space 1 double_crochet into each chain across until previous chain 1 space chain 1 repeat from * around slip_stitch into the 1st chs you made in this row repeat row 3 for any future row you want to make ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ i have this free pattern on my blog here playlist featuring more free square tutorials here ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ follow crochet me lovely on all social media @crochetmelovely if you want to learn new stitches and techniques subscribe to my youtube channel here find more patterns on my blog here if you have any questions about this pattern email me at crochetmelovely@yahoo com thank you for downloading this pattern enjoy
